duck: Congruence (geometry), being isometric — roughly, the same size and shape
congruence definition: the quality or state of agreeing, coinciding, or being congruent.

wiki.text: 'Congruence' (symbol: '[[≅ (disambiguation)|≅]]') is the state achieved by coming together, the state of agreement. The Latin meaning “I meet together, I agree”. As an abstract term, congruence means similarity between objects. Congruence, as opposed to approximation, is a relation which implies a species of equivalence.
wiki.title: congruence
